comment: Everything is online at your on pace with assignments or tests due every week or two weeks. You can take assignments and tests several times so you can improve your grade. At the end of the semester, she replaced the lowest test grade with my final exam grade which helped me a lot!

Great prof!!! Class was straight forward.  Multiple homework and test attempts.  Fairly easy A.  No late work accepted, but everything is open so you have plenty of time to get stuff done. Always answers emails and answers questions. I would definitely take her again.
Lessons, homework and tests are all online and completed on your time. Multiple chances allowed. It really helped my final grade that the final exam replaced my lowest test grade
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Perfect class if you can learn on your own time without lectures and need a flexible class. It worked great with my work schedule. Just plan ahead and don't start homework assignments and tests on the due dates because you get multiple attempts.

Took online. Everything is in Achieve. The course is not too hard but there is zero teaching from Prof. Bonanni. If you are good at learning by yourself you will do fine but if you need an involved professor avoid her.

Lazy professor. Everything's on the Achieve. She posts exam study guides a couple of days before the deadline but they are not helpful. There were a lot of questions on the tests not even from the textbook and nothing like anything we did for homework. One of the tests has a mistake in the answer choice. HWs are easy to pass with 100% though.

This professor is super clear about how her course will go. She creates a schedule that tells us all the due dates for our assignments. It's important to remember that she won't take any late or missed work, so we need to stay on top of things. But hey, the good thing is that she genuinely cares about us and wants us to succeed!

This was an asynchronous class so I could work at my own pace. You can take assignments as many times as you want to make sure you get a 100 on them. That helped me to prepare for tests. We were given two chances on each test. If you do your work, you will do well in this class.
